class pycopancore.model_components.copan_global_like_production.interface.Model[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface for Model mixin.

description = 'Simple four-sector (three energy, one final) economy\n as in copan:GLOBAL, but with cell-based harvesting of terrestrial\n and extraction of fossil carbon and perfect allocation between cells.\n Restriction: cannot deal with nested social_systems yet.'¶

some longer description

name = 'copan:GLOBAL-like economic production'¶

a unique name for the model component

requires = []¶

list of other model components required for this model component to make sense

Interface for SocialSystem entity type mixin.

biomass_input_flow = extensive variable 'biomass input flow' ((in carbon units)), IAMC=Primary Energy|Biomass, not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e9 tC a^-1], >=0, default=0¶
carbon_emission_flow = extensive variable 'carbon emission flow', IAMC=Emissions|CO2, not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e9 tC a^-1], >=0, default=0¶
economic_output_flow = extensive variable 'total economic output flow' ((in value units)), IAMC=GDP|PPP, not None, scale=ratio, unit=[$ a^-1], >=0, default=0¶
emissions_tax_level = variable 'emissions tax level' (level of emissions tax when introduced), not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e-9 $ tC^-1], >=0, default=350000000000.0¶
fossil_fuel_input_flow = extensive variable 'fossil fuels input flow' ((in carbon units)), IAMC=Primary Energy|Fossil, not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e9 tC a^-1], >=0, default=0¶
has_emissions_tax = variable 'has emissions tax' (whether an emissions tax is in force), not None, scale=ordinal, levels=[False, True], default=False¶
has_fossil_ban = variable 'has fossil ban' (whether a fossil ban is in force), not None, scale=ordinal, levels=[False, True], default=False¶
has_renewable_subsidy = variable 'has renewable subsidy' (whether a subsidy for renewables is in force), not None, scale=ordinal, levels=[False, True], default=False¶
physical_capital = extensive variable 'physical capital' ((in value units)), not None, scale=ratio, unit=dollars [$], >=0, default=1 $¶
population = extensive variable 'human population', IAMC=Population, CETS=SP.POP, not None, scale=ratio, unit=people [H], >=0, default=1 H¶
protected_fossil_carbon = variable 'protected stock of fossil carbon' (what stock of the current fossil carbon will be treated as protected and thus not extracted at each point in time), not None, scale=ratio, unit=gigatonnes carbon [GtC], >=0, default=0¶
protected_fossil_carbon_share = variable 'protected share of fossil carbon' (what share of the current fossil carbon will be treated as protected and thus not extracted at each point in time), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], >=0, <=1, default=0¶
protected_terrestrial_carbon = variable 'protected stock of terrestrial carbon' (what stock of the current terrestrial carbon will be treated as protected and thus not harvested at each point in time), not None, scale=ratio, unit=gigatonnes carbon [GtC], >=0, default=0¶
protected_terrestrial_carbon_share = variable 'protected share of terrestrial carbon' (what share of the current terrestrial carbon will be treated as protected and thus not harvested at each point in time), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], >=0, <=1, default=0¶
renewable_energy_input_flow = extensive variable 'non-biomass renewable energy input flow', IAMC=Primary Energy|Non-Biomass Renewables, not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e9 J a^-1], >=0, default=0¶
renewable_energy_knowledge = extensive variable 'renewable energy production knowledge stock' (= non-depreciated cumulative energy produced in the past. Interpreted as in Wright's law), not None, scale=ratio, unit=gigajoules [GJ], >=0, default=1 GJ¶
renewable_subsidy_level = variable 'renewable subsidy level' (level of renewable subsidy when introduced), not None, scale=ratio, unit=[1e-9 $ J^-1], >=0, default=50¶
